trans-unit.source: Describes how a shape is outlined.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何圖形所述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> and thickness.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>和粗細。

trans-unit.source: Thickness is relative to the geometry of the shape associated with this pen.
trans-unit.target: 寬度是相對於圖形這個畫筆與相關聯的幾何。

trans-unit.source: The Brush for this Pen.
trans-unit.target: 這個畫筆筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the Pen.
trans-unit.target: 畫筆的粗細。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fill the outline produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定填滿外框由此產生<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The fill of the outline produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 由此產生的填滿外框的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Brush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Brush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Brush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定如何繪製虛線的端點。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何繪製虛線的端點。

trans-unit.source: This setting applies to both ends of each dash.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定會套用至每個虛線的兩端。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that describes the pattern of dashes generated by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值描述的連字號，這由所產生的模式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles> class provides a set of predefined dash patterns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles>類別會提供一組預先定義的虛線模式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that describes the pattern of dashes generated by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值，描述的連字號，這由所產生的模式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles.Solid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that there should be no dashes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Media.DashStyles.Solid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，表示應該沒有虛線。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of shape to use at the end of a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用筆觸結尾的形狀的型別。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The type of shape that ends the stroke.
trans-unit.target: 結束筆劃的圖形類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.EndLineCap*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.EndLineCap*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.EndLineCap*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於圖形的外框的頂點的接合的型別。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.
trans-unit.target: 接合頂點圖形外框的使用類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineJoin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineJoin"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.LineJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.LineJoin*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.LineJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half this pen's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定斜接角長度至一半此手寫筆的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>總數的比率的限制

trans-unit.source: A miter is a joint made by beveling each of two surfaces to be joined to form a corner.
trans-unit.target: 斜接角是一個結合斜角兩個介面的每個加入至表單的角。

trans-unit.source: When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path.
trans-unit.target: 當兩個線段符合銳角時，斜接角可能會超出線條的粗細畫路徑。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the pen's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.
trans-unit.target: 比率的一半畫筆的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>斜接角長度限制

trans-unit.source: This value is always a positive number greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 這個值一律是大於或等於 1 的正數值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.MiterLimit*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.MiterLimit*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.MiterLimit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of shape to use at the beginning of a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖形使用開頭為筆劃的端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The type of shape that starts the stroke.
trans-unit.target: 啟動筆劃的圖形類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PenLineCap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.StartLineCap*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.StartLineCap*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.StartLineCap*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the thickness of the stroke produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由此產生的筆劃粗細<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Thickness is relative to the geometry of the shape associated with this pen.
trans-unit.target: 寬度是相對於圖形這個畫筆與相關聯的幾何。

trans-unit.source: Negative values are treated as though they were positive.
trans-unit.target: 負數的值會視為好像他們是正數。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the stroke produced by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 由此產生的筆劃粗細<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Default is `1`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`1`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
